items.title: “a rischio ci sono prima di tutto le vite dei palestinesi ma anche il futuro dell’umanità”

"Hay un divorcio ético muy grande entre los gobiernos occidentales y la población que dice: ‘ No en nuestro nombre ’. Por eso nuestra obligación moral y política es movilizarnos para frenar el genocidio"
“Following several weeks at Ktzi’ot and Damon, they’ll be sorry about the time they arrived here. We must eliminate their appetite for another attempt”
"For this case as well, we are prepared. We have gained experience in recent years, and we will act accordingly"
“In the second half it was much more difficult for us,” “We retreated into our own half, defending in the trenches with intense focus and a hellish defence”

“La réaction de Lewis était bonne, c’était une bonne récupération après deux courses difficiles” “Ce n’était pas ce à quoi nous nous attendions, mais c’était beaucoup plus positif que les quatre ou cinq dernières courses”
„Es war magisch, mystisch. Nur wir beide. Denn zusammen, in der Einsamkeit, sind wir am besten“
«L’eredità professionale e umana che ci lascia – (\*) – è straordinaria»
